page.title: 11A DAY IN MY LIFE.
page.content: I am a ten year old girl.I live in a small town called St Day.My house is a four bedroomed house.I get up at 7.45 a.m. and after breakfast I walk to school, meeting my friends on the way. We have a play in the playground and school begins at 8.55.After Assembly we have Maths, followed by playtime, then Spelling or English till lunch at 12.25p.m. In the afternoon we have Art and P.E. After school I go home at 3.20 and get changed.I then go out to play or help Mum by washing up,tidying my bedroom or anything else.Then when I've finished I'm allowed out to play.I come in at 5 o'clock to have my tea.Then I stay in and watch Television or a video.I go to bed at 9 o'clock and I sometimes read before I go to sleep.
